Line: Written by Spike Feresten

I really like the wig historically. I guess the revolutionary war, the last war fought in wig, and it seems that it must have been hard. You know they're going in to battle, they think.. well do I have my bullets? Do I have my bobby pins.. and you got to make sure you have everything... lot more to worry about What if I get killed.? Is my wig on straight? I don't know when the whole wig thing came in to style for men... but I know when it went out.! When the mirror was invented. No guy is looking in the mirror powdering a patch of horsehair on his head going ..All right! lets go rap to the ladies..
I'm looking for a crested blazer
A crested blazer..
I've worn one once and I really think it did something for me.
: Yes .I Think we may have something.
Hmm.. they'll match my sneakers.
It looks fabulous on you... shall I wrap it up?
You know...I'm not sure. I'll tell you what. I'll come back later with someone and see what they think.
A Hum!
Really I'll be back.
Yeah!

So I didn't like the crest all that much., but the guy spent fifteen minutes with me so to get out of the store I told I wanted to see what someone else thought.... And then he makes a face like he doesn't believe me.
Ah! So he knew that you were making it up!
Yeah..... He caught me. So here's what I want you to do. Come back with me to the store and we'll pretend to look at the coat.
That's ridiculous. Why do do you want to go back there if you don't want the coat?
Because he thinks I was lying and I want to show him I wasn't.
But you were!!
But if you go back with me, then I'm not.
All right fine.... Whatever
Problems with the house guest?
What house guest?
This friend of Susan's is staying with us for two weeks...Now am I wrong or is that excessive?
Well Bob Sacamano he stayed with me once for a year and a half.
Who is he?
He's a wig master
What is a wig master?
He's with the touring company of Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat. He's the guy in charge of the wigs.
Boy.. imagine.. liking wigs to the point it becomes a career choice.
About some tickets George, you know I'd kill for a peek..
Yeah, Sure, sure ,,, I got to drop my car off at the new lot.
Euh what...What lot is that?
Jiffy Park. It's incredible.. Seventy-five dollars a month.
Seventy -five bucks a month!
Yeah and you get this really cool T-shirt when you sign on..
Oh I'm down.
Remember me? I said I 'd come back with someone and I did.
No I believed you.
Yeah.... well Elaine.
Oh!... hello I'm Craig.
well here it is.
Oh!!.....Joseph Aboud .. and look at this hand ticking around the crest.
You know your coats?
Well I'm in the biz .. I work for J. Peterman.
I love J. Peterman.
Ohhh!!.
I especially enjoy the catalogue, those fanciful narratives really take me away..
Ohhh!! really ..well you know what, I write those.
No!!!
Yeeeahh!!!
Hey Elaine What about the crest.? What d'you think of the crest
You what??
I think it's great. I think you should get it.
Well .... Will it be check or credit card?
Check.
I'll need you to write down your phone number on the check for me.
You weren't supposed to say that.
But I really did like it
That's not the point. You put me in a position where I had no choice.
uhn... Sorry!
And what about that guy asking you out right in front of me?
What is the big deal!!
...'s very emasculating, he doesn't know the nature of our relationship. You're
He dared....
Hi George.. How was your day?
Good....good day You?
I am getting so much work done..... See?
Very nice
Hi sweety How was your day?
I already ask him that. He said Good...Good day....
Thank god you're home. I'm wiped out.
No I gave it back to you
y'did.........phfwelll. Look.. hum..... Can you take me over there?
Oh Come on!!
Oh Come on Jerry, It's all the way over to twelfth avenue..
: I didn,t tell you to park in that lot .. Now someone's gonna have
I'm not going to take the bus that's why I got a car!
Forget it.
Awright I'm gonna get George to pick me up.
He wont take ya..
Got it, Got it,...Hello?
Listen, Can you take me over to the Jiffy Park?
Yeah,yeah!! I'll pick you up right now.....All right All right....Hey! gotta go.
So the Wig master.......the Wig master said you could stop by the theater tonight..
I like 'em all

....'s'this?
Gawd!!!

Hmmm
except for Jerry!

Cause I can get you a considerable discount.
The Nicole Miller

Well...hum.....we'll just have to do something about that. Won't we.
Ah! Ah!ah!

Because you know we used to go out.

Hey Jerr...
Hi Elaine.
Would you like to buy a rose for your wife?

I want to know how did that get into my car?
Hey look ..You walk in to this city you got to expect things are gonna

Here take a few shirts....

Aaye Mr Kramer....You like Cadillacs?

Mary Kay car..

Well, what about the ponytail?
what about it?
: C'mon Ponytail ...Get real.
All I know he's promised me a discount on that dress.
Of course he did ..The guy's working ya.
Ah! Jerry I've been around long enough to know when I'm being worked.
Have you slept with him yet?
I just met him this morning.
It's been known to happen....... telling you right now Elaine, this guy 's gonna dangle

like a shark fisherman with a bucket of Ch....

Are you a cop??
Oh No nonono I'm not a cop ...Heum... I work for the Yankees.
Urghh They stink.
Nevertheless.. I was wondering if you and your .friends are doing business
Get lost mister, I'm trying to make a living here.
I'll pay you for your time....I just ..I just need some information . How much do you want?
Fifteen?
George?
Hi honey..
..So you're telling me the truth?
Of Course I'm telling the truth.
Because I have to be able to trust you... If I can't trust you then there's no way that
Really!
Yeah.
Well then...then you really have something to think about because.....you know if there's

Because if there's any doubt at all I...I feel we should cultivate it.
Cultivate it?
Yes, you know. Deal with it .We have to deal with the doubt, Susan The DOUBT!! Must be

...Nooooooooooo...

Arrive?

E-an

Bye

Hem!! No reason.
You know that clothing salesman had a lot of nerve hitting on Elaine right in front of me.
Heeeeeummmrph.... I'm gonna turn in
Turn in?
Yeah,I had a tough day

Well ..I don't argue with the body Jerry. It's an argument you can't win.
I can't go to sleep at nine o clock!
Well you can go to your room and read.
Hey look ,you know, you're the one who's locked out. I'm letting you stay here.
But I'm tired..
Oh why don't you go sleep over at Newman's.
Aah! He's got a girl up there. This quilt is too thin...I know I'm gonna get cold.
Well that's all I got.
Can I sleep with you?

Well you got that big comfortable bed and that nice warm quilt.
Kramer , there's no way you're sleeping with me.

Why?

Well I......
Hi!.

Squire's walking stick. I had to write about it for the catalogue.
Wow.

Some friend of his from England.
Don't you see?...........It's all a big scam.

How do you know he's not wondering the same thing about you?

What do I mean?.. Well perhaps he thinks that you're working him for the
Aawwh Please.....
Now see the two of you need to work on trust... and then and only then will there be a free
hmmm....patio furniture's on sale.

Can't do it'

If you read the agreement you signed the deposit is not refundable.
Well does it say anywhere in the contract about my car being used as a whorehouse?
What can I tell you buddy. Take it up with Consumer Affairs.

Well that's going to be a problem

It's all the way in the back. Can't get it out for a couple of days.
What are you talking about.. I WANT
We ask that you please bear with us.
Bear with you! This is a parking lot

Excuse me I'd like to return this jacket.
Certainly. May I ask why?
........For spite...
Spite?
That's right. I don't care for the salesman that sold it to me.
I don't think you can return an item for spite.
What do you mean?
Well if there was some problem with the garment. If it were unsatisfactory in some way,then
That's ridiculous, I want to return it. What's the difference what the reason is.
Let me speak with the manager...excuse me .............Bob!
What seems to be the problem?
Well I want to return this jacket and she asked me why and I said for spite and now she
That's true. You can't return an item based purely on spite.
. Well So fine then ..then I don't want it and then that's why I'm returning it
Well you already said spite so......
But I changed my mind..

It's Halloween
Get a calendar honey! It's the 90's

I'm Ethan

nice to see you..
